wikipedia_page.main: Anthony Douglas Weston (born 3 April 1946) is an English former professional footballer. He spent his entire professional career with Gillingham, where he made over 160 Football League appearances.

response: Tony Weston may refer to two English footballers:
*Tony Weston (footballer, born 1946), former Gillingham F.C. player
*Tony Weston (footballer, born 2003), current Blackpool F.C. player
